pk.contender.earmouse

Class ModuleManagerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • pk.contender.earmouse.ModuleManagerActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagerListFragment.OnModuleSelectedListener

    public class ModuleManagerActivity
extends Activity
implements ManagerListFragment.OnModuleSelectedListener
    Activity for displaying a list of Modules available for remote installation and installing these modules either one by one or in a batch.
    Author:
    Paul Klinkenberg

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ModuleManagerActivity.fetchAndInstallSelection
      Downloads and installs all the modules in selection
      private class  ModuleManagerActivity.FetchListJsonFromServer
      Downloads a list of available modules and displays its contents, minus the modules that are already installed, in ManagerListFragment

      when in ActionMode, this List contains all the Modules the user currently has selected.
